message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, which I believe will be a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500 for the item.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9500 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
I understand your perspective, Alice. However, given my assessment of the product's value, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9000 for the item.
